iree_add_all_subdirs()

file(GLOB _GLOB_X_TD LIST_DIRECTORIES false RELATIVE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} CONFIGURE_DEPENDS *.td)
iree_cc_library(
  NAME
    IR
  HDRS
    "IREEDialect.h"
    "IREEOps.h"
    "IREEOps.h.inc"
    "IREETraits.h"
    "IREETypes.h"

    "IREEDialect.cpp"

)

  NAME
    IREEOpsGen
  TD_FILE
    "IREEOps.td"
  OUTS
    -gen-op-decls IREEOps.h.inc
    -gen-op-defs IREEOps.cpp.inc
)
